title: ICE: const pattern should've been rewritten

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Code:

```
struct S(u8);
const C: S = S(10);

fn main() {
    let C(a) = S(11); // Or let C(..) = S(11);
}
```

This reproduces on nightly and beta, but not on stable, i.e. this is a regression.

Backtrace:
